data.title: Facebook’s latest experiment is Hobbi, an app to document your personal projects
data.text: Facebook is adding another app to its group of experimental projects from the NPE Team, an initiative it announced last year focused on rapidly trying out new ideas in social to see how users react.

data.title: Reuters And Facebook Team Up To Flag Fake And Misleading Videos
data.text: The partnership involves a new task force dedicated to debunking false content on Facebook and Instagram.

data.title: 15 Stocks to Buy Based On The 2020 U.S. Presidential Election
data.text: Here's your complete guide on which stocks to buy, depending on who wins the 2020 U.S. Presidential Election.

data.title: Value Investors: Stocks for the Growth Stock Boom
data.text: Growth stocks continue to hit new all-time highs nearly every day but that doesn't mean value investors have to sit on the sidelines.

data.title: Russian court fines Facebook $63,000 over data law breach: RIA
data.text: A Russian court fined social media company Facebook 4 million roubles ($62,922) on Thursday for its failure to comply with a Russian data law, the RIA news agency reported.

data.title: Have Google and Facebook Reached a Tipping Point?
data.text: Investors may have to get used to slower growth from these two popular tech stocks.

data.title: Facebook Dating launch blocked in Europe after it fails to show privacy workings
data.text: Facebook has been left red-faced after being forced to call off the launch date of its dating service in Europe because it failed to give its lead EU data regulator enough advanced warning — including failing to demonstrate it had performed a legally required assessment of privacy risks.
